p.k: We got hits. We got hits from the 80s. And guess what? They don't stop! You're welcome!
Pencil us in because we've organised the greatest hits of the '80s for you. ou're welcome!
These boys were born to be wild in the 80s! Check out all of 40 huge hits and iconic anthems right here!
We're powering-up the time machine and going back to celebrate the first years of our MTV lives! This time we land in. 1982!
Join us for the ultimate 80s pop playlist that will make you want to get up and dance!
Grab your popcorn and put on your 3D glasses because MTV 80s is heading to the movies, with all the big screen soundtrack hits of the 80s!
Hard! Alternative! Heavy! Post-punk! Metal! Indie! Goth! Call it what you want, but turn up the volume as we delve into the decade's best rock tracks
Get ready because we're bringing you nothing but classic hits and iconic anthems from the 80s!
